messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks

LGTM



On Fri, Jun 21, 2013 at 10:08 AM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev1,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go.**talks <https://code.google.com/p/go.talks>
>
>
> Description:
> go.talks/2012/splash.article: fix typo
>
> Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.**com/10365054/<https://codereview.appspot.com/10365054/>
>
> Affected files:
>   M 2012/splash.article
>
>
> Index: 2012/splash.article
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/2012/splash.article
> +++ b/2012/splash.article
> @@ -812,7 +812,7 @@
>  software, it is our opinion that the model has been overused and that it
>  is worth taking a step back.
>
> -Instead, Go has _interfaces_, an idea that as been discussed at length
> elsewhere (see
> +Instead, Go has _interfaces_, an idea that has been discussed at length
> elsewhere (see
>  [[http://research.swtch.com/**interfaces][research.swtch.**com/interfaces<http://research.swtch.com/interfaces%5D%5Bresearch.swtch.com/interfaces>
> ]]
>  for example), but here is a brief summary.
>
>
>

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=50c319faa3a9&repo=talks ***

go.talks/2012/splash.article: fix typo

CC=golang-dev
